reviewText: Expensive and only one new advice in the CD. And the record is not high quality. Better to buy her book.

Overall a great purchase, and for the price, you just can't beat it.  Ginie covers interesting descriptions of the 4 types of rich (I thought rich was rich...), what their buying hot buttons are, and how you can feature your product to them in the best possible way.  The last 20 minutes provide outstanding marketing tips that you could apply to any business.  Just a heads-up... The first 15 mins were almost painful, so pleeeeese hang in there (I almost gave up), but then it gets better and better.  She seems a little uncomfortable in front of the camera, but the content is there. I am considering her other products, as I like her marketing ideas and insight.
